tool.name: gProfiler SNPense
tool.description: maps SNP rs-codes to gene names, chromosomal coordinates and variant effects

param.name: input
param.label: Input is whitespace-separated list of SNP IDs to be translated (should start with prefix ’rs’).

param.name: filter_na
param.label: Filter N/A
param.help: Whether to filter out results without a corresponding target name.
